main event: A ground-visual observation of a UFO took place on November 5, 1954, in Topia, New Mexico. The object was observed for 1-2 minutes before disappearing.
interesting points: The observation took place on November 5, 1954, during a short period of 1-2 minutes.
The location of the sighting was Topia, New Mexico.
The report indicated the presence of photographs to document the UFO sighting.
The observation was described as a ground-visual type with only one object being observed.
The report suggested that the object could have been a meteor or meteorite.
